nl.han.ica.oopg.engine

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • processing.core.PApplet
              • nl.han.ica.oopg.engine.GameEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FocusListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Runnable, EventListener, Accessible, processing.core.PConstants

    public abstract class GameEngine
extends processing.core.PApplet
    GameEngine is the core of the game. Extending this class is required to make use of the GameEngine.

    This engine is created by: Bram Heijmink, Jeffrey Haen, Joost Elshof, Kenny Ligthart, Mark Vaesen and Nico Smolders.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • deleteAllGameObjectsOfType

        public <T extends GameObject> void deleteAllGameObjectsOfType(Class<T> type)
        Delete all GameObjects of a given type from the GameEngine.

        Example paramater: Player.class

        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type, should extend GameObject
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the gameobjects

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame()
        Updates every GameObject inside the GameEngine. Calls move method and checks for collision.

        This method is called by the GameThread.

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Implement this method to make constant updates in your game

      • setGameSpeed

        public void setGameSpeed(int updatesPerSecond)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the amount of updates per second for the GameThread.
        Parameters:
        updatesPerSecond - The number of udates per second
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the updatesPerSecond is smaller than 1

      • calculateRelativeMouseLocation

        public processing.core.PVector calculateRelativeMouseLocation(int x,
                                                              int y)
        Gets and calculates the relative mouse position with the location of world (TileMap). A negative value means the mouse position is detected outside the world map.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y coordinate
        Returns:
        PVector

      • getGameSpeed

        public int getGameSpeed()
        Gets the amount of updates per second from the GameThread.
        Returns:
        int

      • pauseGame

        public void pauseGame()
        Pauses the Game.

      • resumeGame

        public void resumeGame()
        Resumes the Game.

      • getThreadState

        public boolean getThreadState()
        Returns if the game thread is paused or not
        Returns:
        isGamePaused or !isGamePaused

      • setTileMap

        public void setTileMap(TileMap tileMap)

        Parameters:
        tileMap - The tilemap to be set

      • createPGraphics

        public static processing.core.PGraphics createPGraphics(int width,
                                                        int height)
        Creates a new PGraphics (canvas) object which can only made by the PApplet. (this method is used by the GameEngine)
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the PGraphics
        height - The height of the PGraphics

        PGraphics
